Sentencas: In this study, Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-delta (x = 0, 0.05, 0.10, 0.15, and 0.20) electrolyte powders were synthesized via the sol-gel method.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-δ solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Phase structure, surface chemical state and defect, micromorphology, direct band gap, thermal expansion, and electrical properties were characterized using X-ray diffraction (XRD), X-ray photoelectron and Raman spectroscopy, field emission scanning electron microscopy (FESEM), UV-Visible spectroscopy, thermal dilatometer, and AC impedance spectroscopy, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-δ solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: XRD results confirmed formation of a single phase with cubic fluorite structure for all samples.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-δ solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: XPS study and Raman spectroscopy analysis revealed the existence of oxygen vacancies in all the compositions.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-δ solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The estimated concentration of oxygen vacancies first increased and then decreased with the increase of Dy3+ doping content.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-δ solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: The oxygen vacancy concentration was found to be highest for Ce0.85Dy0.1Ca0.02Bi0.03O1.915 composition among all the samples.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-δ solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: FESEM analysis revealed a high density in the microstructure of all samples, and the average grain size of the sample x = 0.10 was larger than that of the other samples.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-δ solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: UV-Vis spectroscopy showed the minimized direct band gap for Ce0.85Dy0.10Ca0.02Bi0.03O1.915.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-δ solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopy measurements revealed the highest total electrical conductivity and the lowest activation energy for the same composition Ce0.85Dy0.1Ca0.02Bi0.03O1.915, i.e., 3.53 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-δ solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: S/cm at 700 degrees C and 0.79 eV, respectively.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-δ solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Linear thermal expansion results of all the samples showed moderate thermal expansion coefficients (TECs).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-δ solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs

Sentencas: Therefore, Ce0.85Dy0.1Ca0.02Bi0.03O1.915 is expected to be used as an electrolyte material for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of Ce0.95-xDyxCa0.02Bi0.03O2-δ solid electrolytes for IT-SOFCs
